title: Jimmy the C
creator_credit: Jimmy Picker, Jimmy the C Productions and Motionpicker Studios
brief_description: Animated film in which a clay Jimmy Carter (using the voice of Ray Charles) evokes the simpler days prior to his Presidency by singing “Georgia on my mind”, flanked by an American flag and backed by a trio of top-hatted peanuts.
